description: From a series of ten woodcuts for Die Tragische Sendung (The Tragic Commission), by Hermann Kasack, Rowohlt Verlag, Berlin 1920; figure dressed in black with hands positioned on either side of face; a crescent moon is above the figure
portfolio: From Plate 5 from Die Tragische Sendung (The Tragic Commission), by Hermann Kasack, Rowohlt Verlag, Berlin 1920
title: For the Fifth Scene, Plate 5 from Die Tragische Sendung (The Tragic Commission)
